TEXT.TITLE: GM <GM> CANADA MARCH CAR SALES UP 12.6 PCT
TEXT.BODY: General Motors of Canada Ltd, wholly owned by General Motors Corp, said March car sales increased 12.6 pct to 38,520 units from 34,209 units a year earlier. Year-to-date car sales fell 10.1 pct to 82,000 units from 91,243 units in the same period last year, the company said. Reuter
